name: Send a welcome email via Sendinblue for new leads from Facebook Lead Ads
description: Effortlessly engage with your new leads by automating your email outreach! This template connects Facebook Lead Ads and Sendinblue, ensuring that every time a new lead is generated through your Facebook Lead Ads, an email is automatically sent via Sendinblue. Streamline your lead nurturing process and enhance your marketing efforts without lifting a finger. Perfect for businesses looking to maintain timely communication with potential customers.
